watchCurrent.title: Cowboy Bebop - Live Action
watchCurrent.comments: I have watched the anime several times and this series is just blowing me away.  They have managed to take something that was perfect and make it more perfect.  I am seriously considering quitting Netflix over this cancellation.  The stupidity of that decision is mind boggling.

watchPrev.title: Russian Doll
watchPrev.comments: I almost stopped watching this a couple of times but something just kept bringing me back.  Natasha Lyonne is a fantastic city-girl and I really love the way NYC is like a character in the show.  Overall it was really well done and a great story.

watchNext.title: Young Justice
watchNext.comments: I'm actually a couple of seasons into this already and I'll finish it up after Bebop.  It's really well done as are most if not all of DC's animated movies and series.  I don't know why they just don't get those folks to write and direct their movies.

gameCurrent.title: Arma Reforger
gameCurrent.comments: I have been a huge fan of the Arma series since Arma 2.  I have the most hours of any game ever in DayZ mod and I doubt that will ever change.  The mods are amazing.  Once you get used to this level of movement in a shooter - prone, different levels of crouching, leaning, combat movement, being able to look around independant of movement direction - anything else just feels subpar.

gamePrev.title: Space Engineers
gamePrev.comments: Like Arma, I frequently come back to this game and I buy all DLCs to support it even if I'm not currently playing.  It is an incredible masterpiece of a game and still improving.  I can't recommend it enough to anyone but I never hesitate to try and get my engineering friends to try it.

gameNext.title: Valheim
gameNext.comments: I played this a lot when it first came out and I'm definitely jumping back in when the Mistlands update drops.
